attributes.action: Keep virgin Trains running the westcoast main line and not first
attributes.additional_details:
Cancel the agreement for first to takeover the westcoast main line trains.
KEEP VIRGIN TRAINS RUNNING THE SERVICE
They have been doing a fantastic job for 14 years and have now just been thrown in the rubbish bin.
This government have put MONEY ahead of qualilty and good service to the public and we need to get this agreement reversed and Virgin Trains back running the service.
